name: omnivorously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is enthusiastic and interested in many different areas of a subject: She has been reading omnivorously since the age of 12. His collection of old postcards is omnivorously eclectic.
More examplesFewer examplesIt was clear from all the literary references that he dropped into conversation that he was an omnivorously literate person.When asked how she remains so intellectually sharp, she replied that the secret is to be omnivorously curious.He consumes information omnivorously, with apparently no limit on how much he can absorb.
